svg.text: OCR • Change Detection • Content Hashing • UI Element Recognition
Intelligent Routing • Context Packaging • Rate Limiting
High Priority: Immediate Actions (App Control, Quick Commands)
Medium Priority: Screen Analysis, Task Management
Low Priority: Complex AI Tasks, Journaling
• 70% Cost Reduction through local processing and intelligent caching
• Sub-second response time for 80% of common operations
• Offline capability for basic functions (app control, local file access, cached responses)
• Smart context management reduces token usage by 60%
• Modular design allows incremental feature rollout
